SWADESPICE.SettingHint-LeftBarBGColour: The background colour of the left bar on the sheet, where derived stats are.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-TopBarColour: The background colour of the top bar on the sheet, where the name is.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-BodyBGColour: The background colour of the main body on the sheet, where you find the tabs and their content.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-LeftBarBGImage: The background image of the left bar on the sheet, where derived stats are.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-TopBarBGImage: The background image of the top bar on the sheet, where the name is.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-BodyBGImage: The background image of the main body on the sheet, where you find the tabs and their content.
SWADESPICE.ThemeHint: Here you can load a predefined theme.
SWADESPICE.CustomSheetHint: Click this buttom to customize all aspects of the sheet
